text: Aey humaray perwerdigar! Mein ney apni kuch aulad iss bey kheti ki wadi mein teray hurmat walay ghar kay pass basaee hai. Aey humaray perwerdigar! Yeh iss liye kay woh namaz qaeem rakhen pus to kuch logon kay dilon ko inn ki taraf maeel ker dey. Aur enhen phalon ki roiziyan inayat farma takay yeh shukar guzari keren
